mapper.select: SELECT count(1) as A from VW_CAS_USERS_DB_NOW where login_id=#{login_id} and USER_PSWD =#{password}

SELECT d.DOMAIN_NAME FROM ( SELECT d.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY UCASE(DOMAIN_NAME) ORDER BY ROW_CREATED DESC, DOMAIN_ID DESC) AS ROW_NUM FROM VW_CAS_MSAD_DOMAIN_DEF_T d WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM VW_CAS_MSAD_DOMAIN_LIST_T r WHERE d.DOMAIN_NAME=r.DOMAIN_NAME ) ) d
SELECT r.HOST_DNS_NAME AS SVR_NAME, r.HOST_IP_ADDRESS AS SVR_IP FROM VW_CAS_MSAD_DOMAIN_LIST_T r WHERE r.DOMAIN_NAME=#{DOMAIN_NAME} ORDER BY SVC_PRIORITY ASC, SVC_WEIGHT ASC, SVR_TTL DESC
